about_the_game:
MAJOR UPDATE (JANUARY 2025)

Hello Go-Kart Drivers!

After more than seven years of the release of Go-Kart Racing on Steam,  I am proud to announce a MAJOR update for the game that will be available immediately! There's a long list of updates,  so feel free to take a look below.

Update Notes:

  • HDRP Added to Rendering and Major Graphics Overhaul

  • Three Reimagined HDRP Race Tracks Replace the Original Lower-Quality Tracks

  • Major AI Driving Overhauls Increase AI Knowledge and Competitiveness

  • Aerodynamic Drafting System with Slipstream Effects

  • Reimagined Karting Physics and Updated Racing Physics

  • Completely New UI Interface for Cleaner Presentation

  • Results Screen with More Data

  • Added Difficulty Settings for AI Drivers

  • Animated Steering Wheel with New Onboard Camera 

  • And MUCH More! 

GAME FEATURES

Go-Kart Racing provides racers with a thrilling go-kart racing experience. Compete against drivers out on the race track to prove that you are the fastest!

Experience high speeds, big karting crashes, and exhilaration as you battle your way through the pack and compete for victory.

FEATURES

  • Race against several other AI Drivers out on the track.

  • Race on 3 challenging Go-Kart race tracks.

  • Customize your Go-Kart Paint Livery.

  • Earn Steam Achievements as you complete races.

  • Compete on the Steam Leaderboards to earn the best finish.

QUICK RACES

  • Customize the length of your own races on three different racetracks.

  • Compete in quick races to practice and improve your speed.

COMPETITIVE AI RACING

  • AI Drivers will compete on the racetrack and look for the best opportunities to pass each other during each race event.

  • At each event, some AI Drivers may have more competitive cars depending on their performance.

Gamepad Controllers are recommended for the greatest driving experience.
detailed_description:
MAJOR UPDATE (JANUARY 2025)

Hello Go-Kart Drivers!

After more than seven years of the release of Go-Kart Racing on Steam,  I am proud to announce a MAJOR update for the game that will be available immediately! There's a long list of updates,  so feel free to take a look below.

Update Notes:

  • HDRP Added to Rendering and Major Graphics Overhaul

  • Three Reimagined HDRP Race Tracks Replace the Original Lower-Quality Tracks

  • Major AI Driving Overhauls Increase AI Knowledge and Competitiveness

  • Aerodynamic Drafting System with Slipstream Effects

  • Reimagined Karting Physics and Updated Racing Physics

  • Completely New UI Interface for Cleaner Presentation

  • Results Screen with More Data

  • Added Difficulty Settings for AI Drivers

  • Animated Steering Wheel with New Onboard Camera 

  • And MUCH More! 

GAME FEATURES

Go-Kart Racing provides racers with a thrilling go-kart racing experience. Compete against drivers out on the race track to prove that you are the fastest!

Experience high speeds, big karting crashes, and exhilaration as you battle your way through the pack and compete for victory.

FEATURES

  • Race against several other AI Drivers out on the track.

  • Race on 3 challenging Go-Kart race tracks.

  • Customize your Go-Kart Paint Livery.

  • Earn Steam Achievements as you complete races.

  • Compete on the Steam Leaderboards to earn the best finish.

QUICK RACES

  • Customize the length of your own races on three different racetracks.

  • Compete in quick races to practice and improve your speed.

COMPETITIVE AI RACING

  • AI Drivers will compete on the racetrack and look for the best opportunities to pass each other during each race event.

  • At each event, some AI Drivers may have more competitive cars depending on their performance.

Gamepad Controllers are recommended for the greatest driving experience.
name: Go-Kart Racing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 400 Series or later.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio
  • Additional Notes: PS4 Controller Recommended

short_description: Go-Kart Racing provides racers with a thrilling go-kart experience. Compete against drivers out on the race track to prove that you are the fastest!
